text: doosaree or jo dar rakhanevaale hai unase kaha jaata hai, "tumhaare rab ne kya avatarit kiya?" ve kahate hai, "jo sabase uttam hai." jin logon ne bhalaee kee unakee is duniya mein bhee achchhee haalat hai aur aakhirat ka ghar to achchha hai hee. aur kya hee achchha ghar hai dar rakhanevaalon ka
